DOC.brief_summary: The study aims at determining the best biometry calculation formula to be used in IOL calculation of cataract patients how previously underwent laser refractive correction surgery
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Intraocular Lens Power Calculation Methods After Corneal Laser Refractive Surgery in Axial and Refractive Ammertropia
DOC.detailed_description: Patients undergoing laser refractive surgery will will be investigated in means of Pentacam testing and IOL master biometry both preoperative and 6 weeks postoperative to determine which IOL calculation formula is the nearest and most accurate to preoperative records in different refractive sittings.
DOC.criteria: all patient undergoing laser refractive surgery previous ophthalmic surgery previous trauma ocular pathology other than refractive error
